creationInfo: After his friend Bucky went of to war Steve agreed to be part of experiments to create a super soldier. These experiments worked but in the process they turned him into a robot. In the end Steve managed to get sent to the front lines where he led a team called the howling commandos with his second in command James 'Bucky' Barnes. However this ended when he crashed a plane into ice. He was found seventy years later and joined a team called the Avengers.
